players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead on the first night. Let's be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions and words."
Bob: "I agree with Alice - losing Diana so early is unfortunate. We need to work together carefully to find the mafioso among us."

Charlie: "I believe it's important that we all share any suspicious observations or interactions we had with Diana or Bob during the night. Let's work together to ensure the safety of our village and uncover the truth behind Diana's death."
Bob: "Charlie seems very eager to direct suspicion toward me specifically. Why single me out when we're all equally suspicious at this point?"
